titles.title: Child Is Missing Alert and Recovery Center Act

A bill to direct the Attorney General to make an annual grant to the A Child Is Missing Alert and Recovery Center to assist law enforcement agencies in the rapid recovery of missing children, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 2/26/2008--Introduced. A Child Is Missing Alert and Recovery Center Act - Directs the Attorney General to make annual grants to the A Child Is Missing Alert and Recovery Center to assist federal, state, and local law enforcement agencies in recovering missing children.
